survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Retail
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction with their recent online shopping experience, focusing on usability, product quality, and delivery service.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your recent online shopping experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your recent online shopping experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of your shopping experience met your expectations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture nuanced feedback.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of your shopping experience met your expectations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our online store to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question. Use a 5-point scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our online store to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for your recent purchase?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field to capture additional reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with an open-text option (radio buttons + text input)

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for your recent purchase?

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your shopping experience.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question helps identify specific pain points for dissatisfied customers.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your shopping experience.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1

questions.question_text: How easy was it to navigate our website?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure usability. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: How easy was it to navigate our website?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery time of your order?
questions.client_notes: This question measures satisfaction with delivery speed, a critical factor in online retail.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery time of your order?

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any issues with the product(s) you received?
questions.client_notes: A simple yes/no question to identify product-related issues.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any issues with the product(s) you received?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the issue(s) with the product(s).
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question provides detailed feedback on product issues.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the issue(s) with the product(s).

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of the product(s) you received?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure product quality perceptions.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of the product(s) you received?

questions.question_text: How often do you shop online?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment respondents by their online shopping frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you shop online?

questions.question_text: What additional features or services would you like to see on our website?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question captures suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional features or services would you like to see on our website?
